params._amount: The amount of base units the entity will be allowed to spend.
params._spender: The entity allowed to spend funds.

balanceOf(address).details: Gets the balance of the specified address.

params._owner: The address to query the balance of.

returns._0: uint256 value representing the amount owned by the passed address.

params._controller: The new controller of the contract

params._spender: The entity whose spending allocation will be reduced.
params._subtractedValue: The reduction of spending allocation in base units.

params._amount: The amount of wrapped pinakions to mint.

params._addedValue: The amount of extra base units the entity will be allowed to spend.
params._spender: The entity allowed to spend funds.

params._name: for the wrapped PNK on the home chain.
params._symbol: for wrapped PNK ticker on the home chain.
params._xPinakion: the home PNK contract which is already bridged to the foreign PNK contract.

onTokenBridged(address,uint256,bytes).details: Converts bridged PNK (xPinakion) into wrapped PNK which can be staked in KlerosLiquid. If the tokenBridge is calling this function, then this contract has already received the xPinakion tokens. Notice that the Home bridge calls onTokenBridge as a result of someone invoking `relayTokensAndCall()` on the Foreign bridge contract.

params._amount: The amount of wrapped PNK to mint.
params._data: Calldata containing the address of the recipient. Notice that the address has to be padded to the right 32 bytes.
params._token: The token address the _amount belongs to.

params._amount: The amount to tranfer in base units.
The amount to tranfer in base units.
params._sender: The entity to take the funds from.

params._amount: The amount of bridged PNK to withdraw.

withdrawAndConvertToPNK(uint256,address).details: This function is not strictly needed, but it provides a good UX to users who want to get their Mainnet's PNK back. What normally takes 3 transactions, here is done in one go. Notice that the PNK have to be claimed on Mainnet's TokenBridge by the receiver.

params._amount: The amount of PNK to withdraw.
params._receiver: The address which will receive the PNK back in the foreign chain.

Approval(address,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when the allowance of a `spender` for an `owner` is set by a call to {approve}. `value` is the new allowance.

Transfer(address,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when `value` tokens are moved from one account (`from`) to another (`to`).

decimals().notice: Number of decimals of the token.

deposit(uint256).notice: Converts bridged PNK (xPinakion) into wrapped PNK which can be staked in KlerosLiquid.

tokenBridge().notice: xDai Token Bridge. The Token Bridge is upgradeable.

totalSupply().notice: Total supply of the token. Equals the total xPinakion deposit into the contract.

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Moves `_amount` tokens from the caller's account to `_recipient`.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Moves `_amount` tokens from `_sender` to `_recipient` using the allowance mechanism. `_amount` is then deducted from the caller's allowance.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Converts wrapped PNK back into bridged PNK (xPinakion).

withdrawAndConvertToPNK(uint256,address).notice: Converts wrapped PNK back into PNK using the Token Bridge.

xPinakion().notice: Bridged PNK on xDai to be wrapped. This token is upgradeable.
